Description.Name: Junkyard Leopard
Description.Details: Since the Argo has working small craft bays, there is no real need for the Fighter cubicles on the Leopard anymore. We can just transfer the Fighter cubicles to the Argo's cargo bays, and use the freed-up space and storage for something more useful - deploying additional units.

AssignedCastDescription: If we get this up and running, our tactical flexibility will take a big step up, Commander.
